1.0.name: wordpress/pre-draft-camps
1.0.description:
This plugin create Pre Draft Camp environment on your website.

You can create/manage Camp, Venue and Coach within your website.

Shortcodes are available for upcoming camp listing and detail page for any camp by id.

Upcoming camp listing: [upcoming_camps]

Camp Detail Page: [pdc_camp campid=CAMPID]

Plugin contain its own template for camp detail page.

Widget is also here to show coming camp in slide show way.

I have added Camp gallery section where admin can manage its gallery images.

I have tested it and 100% working.
